name: HKQueryDescriptor
desc: A descriptor that specifies a set of samples based on the data type and a predicate.

items.name: init(sampleType: HKSampleType, predicate: NSPredicate?)
items.desc: Creates a new descriptor for the data type and predicate you provided.

items.name: var predicate: NSPredicate?
items.desc: The predicate that filters samples matching this descriptor.

items.name: var sampleType: HKSampleType
items.desc: The data type of samples that match this descriptor.
